items.title: Also / Is also
items.comment: Used to indicate something is also the case or true.

items.text: 小明是我的同学, 也说我的朋友。
items.title: Xiao Ming is my classmate, and also my friend.
items.pinyin: xiǎo míng shì wǒ de tóngxué, yě shì wǒ de péngyǒu.
items.pronounce: shyow ming shrr waw duh tong-shweh, yeh shrr waw duh pung-yoe.
items.comment: Used to introduce Xiao Ming as both a classmate and a friend.

items.title: I also really like Chinese food.
items.pinyin: wǒ yě hěn xǐhuān chī zhōngguó cài.
items.pronounce: waw yeh hun shee-hwahn chrr jong-gwaw tsai.
items.comment: Used to say you also like something.

items.text: 他是我的老师, 也是我的朋友。
items.title: He is my teacher, and also my friend.
items.pinyin: tā shì wǒ de lǎoshī, yě shì wǒ de péngyǒu.
items.pronounce: tah shrr waw duh laow-shrr, yeh shrr waw duh pung-yoe.
items.comment: Used to express that someone is both a teacher and a friend.
